title.narrative: GDN's 2019 Global Development Conference in Bonn

description.narrative: Ausrichtung einer Konferenz zum Wissenstransfer über nachhaltige Entwicklung im Dialog zwischen Wissenschaft und Politik in 2019 in Bonn durch Global Development Network (GDN).
Organization of a conference on knowledge transfer on sustainable development in the dialogue between science and politics in 2019 in Bonn by the Global Development Network (GDN).
